name: Bitcoin Or Bomb?
description: You are playing for the FDB agent (Federal defense of the Bitcoins), and you need to find all the bitcoins, before the time runs out and the bombs explode
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 70 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720 screen resolution
